changeSet.author: mbemis
changeSet.sql: insert into super_owners_temp_no_realm select ws.id, ws.namespace, concat("GROUP_", LOWER(CONCAT( SUBSTR(HEX(ws.id), 1, 8), '-', SUBSTR(HEX(ws.id), 9, 4), '-', SUBSTR(HEX(ws.id), 13, 4), '-', SUBSTR(HEX(ws.id), 17, 4), '-', SUBSTR(HEX(ws.id), 21) )), "-PROJECT_OWNER@", "${gcs:appsDomain}"), concat(LOWER(CONCAT( SUBSTR(HEX(ws.id), 1, 8), '-', SUBSTR(HEX(ws.id), 9, 4), '-', SUBSTR(HEX(ws.id), 13, 4), '-', SUBSTR(HEX(ws.id), 17, 4), '-', SUBSTR(HEX(ws.id), 21) )),"-PROJECT_OWNER") from WORKSPACE ws where ws.realm_group_name is null

changeSet.author: mbemis
changeSet.sql: insert into `GROUP` select group_name, group_email from super_owners_temp_no_realm

changeSet.author: mbemis
changeSet.sql: insert into WORKSPACE_ACCESS select s.workspace_id, s.group_name, "PROJECT_OWNER", 0 from BILLING_PROJECT_GROUP bp join super_owners_temp_no_realm s on s.project_name = bp.project_name where PROJECT_ROLE="Owner"

changeSet.author: mbemis
changeSet.sql: insert into WORKSPACE_ACCESS select s.workspace_id, s.group_name, "PROJECT_OWNER", 1 from BILLING_PROJECT_GROUP bp join super_owners_temp_no_realm s on s.project_name = bp.project_name where PROJECT_ROLE="Owner"
